description.paragraph-a: My name is Gosia. I‚Äôm from Poland. I have experience as a polish and german teacher for more than 7 years, some of my students are from Egipt, Argentina, Germany, Scotland, Japan, China, among others. Also, I know french, english and a bit of spanish, so if your goal is to know the basics I can help you with those as well.
description.paragraph-b: When I was a child, language learning became my passion. Being on both sides as stundent and a teacher,  allowed to gain skills to offer a high quality learning experience.
